mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.trade_id AS "traderecord.id", a.pay_id AS "payId", a.pay_title AS "payTitle", a.pay_remark AS "payRemark", a.pay_amount AS "payAmount", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.error_code AS "errorCode", a.error_msg AS "errorMsg", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN trd_traderecord b ON b.id = a.trade_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trd_order( id, trade_id, pay_id, pay_title, pay_remark, pay_amount, pay_time, error_code, error_msg, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{traderecord.id}, #{payId}, #{payTitle}, #{payRemark}, #{payAmount}, #{payTime}, #{errorCode}, #{errorMsg}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE trd_order SET trade_id = #{traderecord.id}, pay_id = #{payId}, pay_title = #{payTitle}, pay_remark = #{payRemark}, pay_amount = #{payAmount}, pay_time = #{payTime}, error_code = #{errorCode}, error_msg = #{errorMsg}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
